name: Siege (AnxiousGamer)
description:
This game was made solo, from scratch, in under 48h as part of the Ludum Dare competition.

You are under Siege. Enemies are appearing with frustrating regularity. Every 10 seconds to be precise.

Build your castle quickly but wisely to survive as long as possible.

Towers merge into larger fortifications, but the type is random. Do you risk upgrading a heavy damage tower in a good position to get a short ranged tower in the middle of your castle? Plan ahead to get support towers and rebuilders in the right places
